# PeerPy

PeerPy is a Python library that makes building WebRTC datachannel apps simple.  
It provides signaling, room management, and integration with aiortc.

## Installation

```
pip install peerpy
```
## Usage

```
from peerpy import Room

room = Room("myroom")

# add peers, manage datachannels, etc.
```
